thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com
thread.title: Sarah Meade

author: Sarah Meade
title: Sarah Meade
text:
Lola has been a great experience so far! I'm thrilled to have a 100% pure product!
I was horrified to learn that tampon companies don't disclose their ingredients' as that no one has ever asked/demanded that they do so. I mean HOW can that be?! So glad I clicked on the Lola video link on fb and that I have a choice about what what I put inside my body. Here here to 100% cotton!
